metadata.title: CVE-2022-2526 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A use-after-free vulnerability was found in systemd. This issue occurs dueto the on_stream_io() function and dns_stream_complete() function in'resolved-dns-stream.c' not incrementing the reference counting for theDnsStream object. Therefore, other functions and callbacks called candereference the DNSStream object, causing the use-after-free when thereference is still used later.

criterions.comment: systemd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
